en-US.alert_about: Create while loops in your shortcuts or and run selected shortcuts in a continuous loop with options to minimize battery life and prevent early termination using Guided Access.
en-US.alert_buy: Thank you for purchasing RepeatCuts and for supporting me as I make advanced shortcuts like this one!
en-US.alert_copied_UUID:
The unique identifier of this RepeatCut has been copied to your clipboard.

You can run this RepeatCut from another shortcut using the Run Shortcut action with RepeatCuts and the following dictionary as input:
en-US.alert_run:
Your shortcut will run repeatedly according to the settings below.

To prevent iOS from prematurely stopping the RepeatCut, keep the Shortcuts app as the frontmost application.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of RepeatCuts.
en-US.menu_run_hideAlert: Run and Don't Show Alert Again
en-US.prompt_brightness:
Set the screen brightness from 0 to 100 when running RepeatCuts.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the brightness at its current value.
en-US.prompt_buy:
Purchase RepeatCuts to unlock Pro features and to remove the alert that appears before running a RepeatCut.

It's quick and easy with Apple Pay.

Thanks in advance for your support!

-adam
en-US.prompt_callback: Do you want to use a custom callback shortcut with this shortcut?
en-US.prompt_callback_shortcut:
Select a shortcut to be used as a callback.

If the shortcut returns ❌❌❌, we will exit the loop.

Otherwise, the callback's return value will be used as input to the primary shortcut.
en-US.prompt_count:
Enter the number of times to run this shortcut.

Enter 0 to run the shortcut continuously.
en-US.prompt_delete: Delete this RepeatCut? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_description: Enter an optional description for this RepeatCut
en-US.prompt_erase_content:
Are you sure you want to delete all RepeatCuts content and settings for this device?

All of your existing RepeatCuts will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_erase_content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all RepeatCuts content and settings for this device?

All of your existing RepeatCuts will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_interval:
Add a delay between each call to the shortcut.

RepeatCuts can wait any number of seconds, minutes, or hours at all when running the shortcut in the foreground.
en-US.prompt_interval_value: Enter the number of {{INTERVALTYPE}} to wait between calls to the shortcut:
en-US.prompt_loops: You have run {{COUNT}} loops with RepeatCuts.
en-US.prompt_loopsBuy: You have run {{COUNT}} loops with RepeatCuts. Purchase a Thank You License to remove this notice and unlock Pro features in RepeatCuts.
en-US.prompt_name: Enter a descriptive name for your new RepeatCut.
en-US.prompt_reset: This operation will reset your RepeatCuts settings or erase all RepeatCuts data.
en-US.prompt_reset_settings:
Are you sure you want to reset RepeatCuts' settings on this device?

None of your content will be affected.
en-US.prompt_shortcut: Select a shortcut to run repeatedly:
en-US.prompt_volume:
Set the volume from 0 to 100 when running RepeatCuts.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the volume at its current value.
